amendment.description: To amend Sec. 301 of Title III of the Energy Policy Act of 1992 (42 U.S.C. 13211) to include neighborhood electric vehicles in the definition of alternative fuel vehicle.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1778 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1778 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S11816-11819; text: CR S11818) To amend Sec. 301 of Title III of the Energy Policy Act of 1992 (42 U.S.C. 13211) to include neighborhood electric vehicles in the definition of alternative fuel vehicle.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1778 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1778 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
